name.english: Al-Baqarah (The Cow) - Continued Guidance to Children of Israel

stages.name: Verse 48
stages.arabic: وَاتَّقُوا يَوْمًا لَّا تَجْزِي نَفْسٌ عَن نَّفْسٍ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُقْبَلُ مِنْهَا شَفَاعَةٌ وَلَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنْهَا عَدْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
stages.english: And fear a Day when no soul will suffice for another soul at all, nor will intercession be accepted from it, nor will compensation be taken from it, nor will they be aided
stages.transliteration: Wattaqoo yawmal laa tajzee nafsun 'an nafsin shai'anw wa laa yuqbalu minhaa shafaa'atunw wa laa yu'khazu minhaa 'adlunw wa laa hum yunsaroon
stages.instruction: Reflect on the Day of Judgment where each soul stands alone

stages.name: Verse 49
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ نَجَّيْنَاكُم مِّنْ آلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُومُونَكُمْ سُوءَ الْعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُونَ أَبْنَاءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُونَ نِسَاءَكُمْ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكُم بَلَاءٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ عَظِيمٌ
stages.english: And [recall] when We saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment, slaughtering your sons and keeping your women alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord
stages.transliteration: Wa iz najjainaakum min Aali Fir'awna yasoomoonakum sooo'al 'azaabi yuzabbihoona abnaaa'akum wa yastahyoona nisaaa'akum; wa fee zaalikum balaaa'um mir Rabbikum 'azeem
stages.instruction: Learn about the trials of the Children of Israel under Pharaoh

stages.name: Verse 50
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ فَرَقْنَا بِكُمُ الْبَحْرَ فَأَنجَيْنَاكُمْ وَأَغْرَقْنَا آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَأَنتُمْ تَنظُرُونَ
stages.english: And [recall] when We parted the sea for you and saved you and drowned the people of Pharaoh while you were looking on
stages.transliteration: Wa iz faraqnaa bikumul bahra fa anjainaakum wa aghraqnaaa Aala Fir'awna wa antum tanzuroon
stages.instruction: Remember the miracle of the parting of the sea

stages.name: Verse 51
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ وَاعَدْنَا مُوسَىٰ أَرْبَعِينَ لَيْلَةً ثُمَّ اتَّخَذْتُمُ الْعِجْلَ مِن بَعْدِهِ وَأَنتُمْ ظَالِمُونَ
stages.english: And [recall] when We made an appointment with Moses for forty nights. Then you took the calf [for worship] after him [i.e., during his absence], and you were wrongdoers
stages.transliteration: Wa iz waa'adnaa Moosaaa arba'eena lailatan summattakhaztumul 'ijla mim ba'dihee wa antum zaalimoon
stages.instruction: Learn about the incident of the golden calf

stages.name: Verse 52
stages.arabic: ثُمَّ عَفَوْنَا عَنكُم مِّن بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
stages.english: Then We forgave you after that so perhaps you would be grateful
stages.transliteration: Summa 'afawnaa 'ankum mim ba'di zaalika la'allakum tashkuroon

stages.name: Verse 53
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ آتَيْنَا مُوسَى الْكِتَابَ وَالْفُرْقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ
stages.english: And [recall] when We gave Moses the Scripture and criterion that perhaps you would be guided
stages.transliteration: Wa iz aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba wal Furqaana la'allakum tahtadoon
stages.instruction: Learn about the giving of the Torah to Moses

stages.name: Verse 54
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ يَا قَوْمِ إِنَّكُمْ ظَلَمْتُمْ أَنفُسَكُم بِاتِّخَاذِكُمُ الْعِجْلَ فَتُوبُوا إِلَىٰ بَارِئِكُمْ فَاقْتُلُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ عِندَ بَارِئِكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
stages.english: And [recall] when Moses said to his people, 'O my people, indeed you have wronged yourselves by your taking of the calf [for worship]. So repent to your Creator and kill yourselves [i.e., the guilty among you]. That is best for you in the sight of your Creator.' Then He accepted your repentance; indeed, He is the Accepting of repentance, the Merciful
stages.transliteration: Wa iz qaala Moosaa liqawmihee yaa qawmi innakum zalamtum anfusakum bittikhaazikumul 'ijla fatooboo ilaa Baari'ikum faqtulooo anfusakum zaalikum khairul lakum 'inda Baari'ikum fataaba 'alaikum; innahoo Huwat Tawwaabur Raheem
stages.instruction: Understand the severity of idol worship and the importance of sincere repentance

stages.name: Verse 55
stages.arabic: وَإِذْ قُلْتُمْ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ نَرَى اللَّهَ جَهْرَةً فَأَخَذَتْكُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَأَنتُمْ تَنظُرُونَ
stages.english: And [recall] when you said, 'O Moses, we will never believe you until we see Allah outright'; so the thunderbolt took you while you were looking on
stages.transliteration: Wa iz qultum yaa Moosaa lan nu'mina laka hattaa naral laaha jahratan fa akhazat kumas saa'iqatu wa antum tanzuroon
stages.instruction: Learn about the consequences of demanding to see Allah
